html:
house of David. This refers to the Davidic dynasty, including Ahaz, who ruled over Judah.

Syria (or Aram). The kingdom of Syria, which was north of ancient Israel.

Ephraim. Here Ephraim represents the Northern Kingdom of Israel, the home of the ten tribes of Israel. Ephraim's boundaries are described in Josh. 16:5-9.

his heart/heart of his people. The hearts of Ahaz and the Judahites became afraid because of the anticipated invasion of Syria and Israel's armies into the kingdom of Judah.
